#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    long long n;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        long long merges = 0;
        scanf("%lld",&n);
        while(n!=1)
        {
            merges += n/2;
            n = n/2 + n%2;

        }
        printf("%lld\n",merges);
    }
    return 0;
}
